meanings.sent1: The fox was very tricksy, sneaking into the henhouse without making a sound.
meanings.sent2: The magician's tricksy ways fooled the audience into believing his illusions.
meanings.sent3: The tricksy raccoon managed to steal the picnic basket without anyone noticing.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as tricksy as a hidden trap, luring unsuspecting victims into her web of lies.
meanings.sent5: The tricksy spy disguised himself so well that even his closest friends couldn't recognize him.

meanings.sent1: The kitten's tricksy behavior kept the family entertained all evening.
meanings.sent2: The children's tricksy giggles could be heard from the other room.
meanings.sent3: The tricksy puppy managed to get into the cookie jar when no one was looking.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes sparkled with a tricksy glint as she planned her next prank.
meanings.sent5: The tricksy squirrel played hide-and-seek with the birds in the garden.
